name: Useful Links.txt - Useful Links
description: This section provides a list of useful links related to Sentry, a popular application monitoring and error tracking platform. The links cover topics such as account management, single sign-on (SSO) configuration, developer resources, and integration with other services like Azure Active Directory. These links serve as a reference for users and developers working with Sentry, providing guidance on setting up and using various features of the platform.
use_cases: Managing user accounts and team membership in Sentry
Configuring Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML2 identity providers
Integrating Sentry with Azure Active Directory
Accessing developer resources and documentation for Sentry
